revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #17 Mago |image = [[File:Mago.png]] |caption = This Berry progressively curves as it grows. The curvier the Berry, the sweeter and tastier. |growtime = 6m 10s |harvest = 16 berries |replant = 30% |points = 50 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *15 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }} '''Mago''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 25, but no more than 80 points of sweet and less than 5 points of all other flavours. The [[Pecha]] must be unlocked to unlock this berry. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 40 secs || 3 mins || 4 mins || 6 mins 10 secs - 12 mins 20 secs |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:MagoTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:MagoTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:MagoTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time |- ! None | 6 mins 10 secs -
12 mins 20 secs |- ! Mulch/Sprayduck | 4 mins 7 secs -
8 mins 13 secs |} == Flow Chart ==
{| style="text-align: center;" |+ '''Flow Chart to get this berry''' |- | Random
Drop |- | ↓ |- | [[File:Pecha.png|20px]] [[Pecha]] |- | ↓ |- | [[File:Mago.png|20px]] [[Mago]] |}
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Mago berries. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] |- | [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || || [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || || |- | || [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || || || [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] |- | [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || || [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] |} {{Berries}}
